subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Knicks Coach Mike D'Antoni said he will treat this as Danilo Gallinari's rookie season after he was limited to 28 games last year and he may not initially be in the starting lineup.
snippet: Knicks Coach Mike D'Antoni said he will treat this as Danilo Gallinari's rookie season after he was limited to 28 games last year and he may not initially be in the starting lineup.
